volunteer_experience.info:
As an Associate of the Fundraising team, my work included managing multiple charity campaigns, coordinating with companies to direct their CSR funds to Covid-19 Relief,  managing and organizing fundraising events, and exploring collaborations with different stakeholders. We have been able to help:9 hospitals to equip them with medical supplies5 graveyards to provide them with essential safety kits3 NGOs to provide them with medical suppliesSupported NGOs to distribute ration…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          As an Associate of the Fundraising team, my work included managing multiple charity campaigns, coordinating with companies to direct their CSR funds to Covid-19 Relief,  managing and organizing fundraising events, and exploring collaborations with different stakeholders. We have been able to help:9 hospitals to equip them with medical supplies5 graveyards to provide them with essential safety kits3 NGOs to provide them with medical suppliesSupported NGOs to distribute ration kits to the deprived Supported NGOs to help migrant workers reach their hometowns Our partners include Action Fund, Governance Alliance, Action for India, Pi consulting & CoronathonOur advisors include Network Capital, OMAG, Stanford Angels and Entrepreneurs
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Covid India Task Force
volunteer_experience.title: Associate

volunteer_experience.info: I volunteered at AIESEC RUC, as a part time teacher in the I SEE YOU program at 2  local impoverished schools in the city of Beijing, China. The experience transformed me as an individual when I was able to experience the satisfaction of making the lives of around 300 students better by interacting with them on a daily basis and embracing the cultural differences we had.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: AIESEC
volunteer_experience.title: Global Citizen Program - Beijing, China

organizations.title: Organisation for Promotion of Science
organizations.description: The Organisation for Promotion of Science is an independent not for profit NGO, based out of Chennai that advocates higher education in the science sector as opposed to mainstream engineering as is the norm in India. It has successfully mentored 1000+ high school students towards their dreams and aspirations
